formula: GOSE_6_Unfav ~ Age + InjuryHx.InjCause + arr_GCS_derived + arr_pp_size + arr_pp_prompt + head_neck_AIS + EDH + contusion + SAH + IVH + MidlineShift + basal_cistern_compression + ns(Alk.Phosphatase, df = 4) + ns(CRP, df = 4) + ns(Albumin, df = 4) + ns(BUN, df = 4) + ns(Sodium, df = 4) + ns(aPTT, df = 4)
